Plot: Pawn in Frankincense is the fourth in the legendary Lymond Chronicles . Somewhere within the bejeweled labyrinth of the Ottoman empire, a child is hidden. Now his father, Francis Crawford of Lymond, soldier of fortune and the exiled heir of Scottish nobility, is searching for him while ostensibly engaged on a mission to the Turkish Sultan. At stake is a pawn in a cutthroat game whose gambits include treason, enslavement, and murder.

Setting: Baden (Switzerland), Lyon (France), Algeria, Tunisia , 1553 Thessaloniki , 1553 (Greece) Constantinople , 1553 (Turkey), Tunisia, Thessaloniki (Greece), Constantinople (Turkey)
